translation.- Criar um projeto com 'npx create-reac: - I know how to create a project with 'npx create-react-app';
translation.- Utilizar o framework i18n em um proje: - Use the i18n framework to create a multi language project;
translation.- Criar e posicionar os elementos de ac: - To create and position the elements according to the project;
translation.- Interpretr e customizar outros projet: - Understand and customize other projects for the purpose of my current project;
translation.- Configurar e utilizar o comando 'npm: - To configure and use the comand 'npm run dev' to start the server;
translation.- Instalar via yarn ou npm;: - To install via npm or yarn;
translation.- Utilizar a CLI para atividades básica: - To use the CLI for basic activities like creating components and starting the server;
translation.- A identificar e customizar dos arquiv: - To identify and customize html, style and script files;
translation.- Criar um projeto em React ou Angular: - To create a project in React or Angular with 'npm/yarn create vite@latest';
translation.- Criar e configurar o arquivo vite.con: - To create and configure the vite.config.js file;
translation.- Instalar os pacotes do package.json c: - To install packages from package.json with 'npm/yarn i';
translation.- Aplicar os conceitos básicos de estil: - To install via npm or yarn;
translation.- Fazer um menu drop-down e implementar: - To make a drop-down menu and implement a darkmode theme for a project;
translation.- Criar e reutilizar CSS com Mixins;: - To create and reuse CSS with Mixins;
translation.- Utilizar @if e @else para adicionar: - To use @if and @else to add logic to styles;
translation.- Dividir os arquivos de estilos em arq: - To split style files into smaller files;
translation.- Importar os arquivos .css e .js em um: - To import .css and .js files into a project;
translation.- Aplicar o conceito de 'Container' e o: - I understand the concept of 'Container' and the 'Grid System' needed to position the elements;
translation.- Utilizar os elementos em um projeto c: - To use the elements in a project based on the documentation;
translation.- Instalar ou usar online em https://vs: - To install or use online at https://vscode.dev/;
translation.- Adicionar plugins e usar teclas de at: - To add plugins and use basic hotkeys;
translation.- Criar um projeto inicial ou abrir um: - To create an initial project or open a directory of an existing project;
translation.- Abrir um terminal Bash para usar CLIs: - Open a Bash terminal to use CLIs;
translation.- Instalar, usar a CLI e iniciar um re: - To install, use the CLI and start a repository with the 'git init' command;
translation.- Adicionar as mudanças do repositório: - To add the repository changes with the command 'git add' and 'git commit;'
translation.- Vincular um repositório local a um re: - To link a local repository to an online GitHub or GitLab repository with 'git remote origin'
translation.- Aplicar o conceito de escopo para dec: - To apply concept of scope for declaring and using functions and variables;
translation.- Pesquisar e adaptar trechos de código: - To research and adapt code snippets for the purpose of my current project;
translation.- Adicionar @types de frameworks ou bib: - To add @types from frameworks or libraries with npm or yarn;
